original_text: And they received of Moses all the offering, which the children of Israel had brought for the work of the service of the sanctuary, to make it withal. And they brought yet unto him free offerings every morning.
korean_text: 그들이 이스라엘 자손의 성소의 모든 것을 만들기 위하여 가져온 예물을 모세에게서 받으니라 그러나 백성이 아침마다 자원하는 예물을 연하여 가져왔으므로

sentences.original_text: And they received of Moses all the offering
which the children of Israel had brought
for the work of the service of the sanctuary
And they brought yet unto him free offerings
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 또 그에게 자원하는 예물을 가져왔으니
